features: 2.5K+1080P Dash Cam Front and Rear Dash Camera --- Milerong New Model Dashcam-A26W dual dash cam is equipped with 170°front camera and 150° rear camera,can simultaneous record videos at 2.5K (2560x 1440P@30fps) front and 1080P (1920x1080@30fps) rear.Help you monitor the front and rear of vehicle,clearly capture road conditions,and provide clear and crisp images and videos.✅Upgrade 1080P-AHD Rear camera with reverse function and 236 inch cable,You can select turn on/off rear camera mirror mode.

Wireless Dash Cam Front and Rear Support APP Control --- The 3 inch compact A26W wireless dash cam is built in WiFi,you can easily enjoy real-time videos, playback, downloads and edit videos from dash camera via the free Viidure app,compatible with Android and IOS devices.Share your travel tales with friends and family with just one click.(NOTE‼️The effective distance is 3-5 meters,and the dash cam front and rear wireless do not support remote connection.)

Dashcams for cars-Easy to Install & Use --- ✅ 2 Suction Cups：Easily mounted to your car’s windshield stable.✅Vehicle backup cameras with reverse function：Connect the red cord with the positive pole of reversing light,when you reverse car, dash cam will provide you reversing aid line safer.✅Car Charger with USB Port：Connect with dash cam and cigarette lighter port,dashcam will turn on and record automatically when your car turn on.✅Besides you can charge other electronic devices through USB Port.

Car Camera with Super Night Vision & WDR --- The car dash camera front and rear achieves super night vision,equipped with F1.8 large aperture + professional WDR + HDR technology,ensure full HD recording during day and night,accurately captures important details clearly under low light conditions.Choose Milerong A26W dual dash cam front and rear,drive safer,record smarter!✅Comes with a 64GB Card (max support is 256GB),you don't need to buy it separately.‼️Must Format it before use.

Car Dash Cam Auto Save Collision Footage & Loop Recording --- Milerong front and rear dash cam is built-in G-sensor function,when front and rear dash camera detect sudden shock/collision,it will automatically lock the video from being overwritten.Also supports loop recording function to continuously record every 1,2,or 5 minutes and auto saved.When memory card is full,dash camera auto overwrites the oldest videos,but video with lock does not cover.

Protect Your Car-Parking Monitor --- After you park the car and the camera powers off,dashcam front and rear camera will stay in standby mode,When driving recorder detects shocking,it will automatically turn on and record 15 seconds of video,then shut down.Evidence for collisions, theft, and vicious scratch happening after you park the car.( Note‼️ If you need 24 hours Parking Monitor,Pls buy hardwire kit separately.)

Guarantee about Dashcams for Cars Front and Rear --- Support lifetime after-sales +1 YEAR warranty (the Card,Car Charger,Suction Cup broken for free replace)+7/24 hours technical service.If you have any questions about dash camera for cars front and rear.Pls contact our customer service team via Amazon and the after-sales email on the manual.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Milerong A26W Dual Dash Cam Front and Rear--2.5K+1080P WiFi Dash Cam with 64GB Memory Card

Wireless Dash Cam Front and Rear---2.5K Dash Cam Front &1080P Rear Camera Warm Notice for you to use dashboard camera for cars first time and daily!!! 1.Format Memory Card 64GB Memory Card has inserted in the dashboard camera. Please Format Card firstly: Find the option of “Format” in dashcam and click “OK” button.In general,Due to you have turned on the funtion of parking montior and G-Sensor, it will acuse too many locked files.To meet your daily needs,you should format the recorder once a month. 2.Keep charging all the time When you first use cameras for cars,please use original car charger until fulled. Also,please always keep the camera plugged into the car's cigarette lighter. Because the internal battery is only support auto turn on and recording a short time for the urgent situation when you parking. 3.Need to record for 24Hours The A26W car cameras has a built-in battery as an internal power source for emergency recording. If you want to keep the camera keep recording for 24 hours Parking Monitor, Please buy hardwire kit separately. 4.Need to Use as back up camera for cars The Vehicle backup cameras with reverse function：Connect the red cord with the positive pole of reversing light,when you reverse car, dash cam will provide you reversing aid line safer. IMPORTANT!!!! ✖️ Do not use the mini USB Cable as the Charger, the USB cable for car dashboard camera and the USB card reader only used to connect with your computer and playback the videos. ✔️ When you meet the freeze or other little problem of interior car camera,you can use the needle to insert the little hole on the " RE" button.

WiFi Dash Cam Support App Control 1. How to Connect to WiFi: Download and open the “Viidure” app, then turn on your dash cam.In your phone's WiFi settings, connect to the device's WiFi (CVR_xxxxx) and enter the password xxxxxxxx.Once the connection is stable, you can configure the camera and app settings on your phone（For more details, please see the instruction manual） 2. Warm Tip About Dashcam WiFi: You need to connect your phone to the dash cam's WiFi using the "Viidure" app when the wireless dashcam is turned on. However, even if the WiFi connection between your phone and the camera for car is lost, the dash cameras will continue recording when it's powered on. In normal use, you don't need to maintain a constant WiFi connection between your phone and the dashcam for it to function.The dashcam's WiFi functions as a hub for data transmission and doesn't provide internet access. It's specifically designed for transferring data and settings, not for browsing the web.

Compact Dash Cam Front and Rear with Powerful Function： 1080P Rear Camera with reverse function Upgrade 1080P Rear Camera：To meet customer needs, Milerong A26W dash cam front and rear is equipped with a upgrade 1080p-AHD rear Camera. Vehicle backup cameras ：Need to connect the red cord with the positive pole of reversing light,when you reverse car, dash cam will provide you reversing aid line safer. Dash Cam with 64GB Memory Card The dash camera comes with a 64GB card, which is already inserted into the dash cam. Note：Please Format Memory Card firstly: Find the option of “Format” in dashcam and click “OK” button. Support max to 256GB, Class 10, U3 memory card. Compact Dash Cam With the compact and 3 Inch design, you don't worry that the dash cam will obstruct your vision while driving.Also you can playback videos and photos conveniently. By the way ,There are 4 ways for you to playback. On the Dash Cam---Press "M" to enter playback mode.On the Phone---Connect dash cam with your phone via wifi,you can download and watch.On the PC by Card Reader---Remove the Card, insert it into the Card Reader,then connect into computer.On the PC by Type-C cable---Connect dash cam and computer via Type-C cable and select "“Mass Storage Mode”.

Dash Cam with Parking Monitor Parking Monitor: After you park the car and the camera powers off,dashcam front and rear camera will stay in standby mode,When driving recorder detects shocking,it will automatically turn on and record 15 seconds of video,then shut down. 24 Hours recording: Need to connect to hardwirw kit, If you need 24 hours Parking Monitor,Pls buy hardwire kit separately. Car camera with Super Night Vision With combination of F1.8 large aperture, HDR Tech and advance night vision sensor, this Car Dash Camera provides a full high-quality videos under low-light conditions. The safety of driving at night will be improved a lot. Dash Camera Built in G-Sensor With built-in G-sensor,A26W dash camera for cars front and rear will automatically recording when detect a sudden shake/collision and lock the footage to prevent the video from being overwritten even in loop recording. Accident scene can be truly restored, then you can stay away from the liar and loss.

Easy to Install & Use Dash Cam：Step 1--Mount the front camera. Dash Cam with 2 Suction Cups---You can Choose one to install to your car’s windshield！ Clean the front windshield.Assemble the suction mount and front camera together.Remove the protective plastic film from the suction pad, push the suction cup onto the inner windshield in a suitable position (Won't shade your vision while driving), rotate the suction bracket handle to ensure that it is well fixed. Note：If your Memory Card, Car Charger, Suction Cup broken,please contact seller for replacement. Step 2--Connect the car original charger to the cigarette lighter. Route the cables through the top ceiling and the A-pillar so that it does not interfere when driving. Step 3--Connect the front and the Rear Camera. Please connect the cables as shown above: Connect the socket to the dash camera’s rear camera interface. If you need reversing aid line when you reverse car，please connect the red cable to the positive lead of reversing lamp.（If not, you no need to connect it.) Step 4--Install the Rear Camera. There are two methods to place the rear camera: Method 1：(Recommended!) Install it near the license plate. There are fixing screws included in the package to assist you in fixing it.Method 2：Mount on the rear windscreen.The package includes a 3M adhesive for the rear camera. Clean the rear windshield and find an appropriate position, then attach the rear camera to the windshield using the adhesive. Step 1--Mount the front camera. Step 2--Connect the car original charger to the cigarette lighter. Step 3--Connect the front and the Rear Camera. Step 4--Install the Rear Camera.

A26W X25-2 X25-3 Pro A25 64GB Micro Memory Card 32GB Micro Memory Card Camera Type Front + Rear Front + Inside Front +Inside + Rear Front + Rear Video Resolution Front: 2.5K；Rear: 1080P Front: 1080P ; Interior:1080P Front: 1080P； Interior + Rear: 720P Front: 1080P； Rear:720P Installation Method Suction mount Suction mount Suction mount Suction mount Screen Type 3.0 inch IPS 2.0 inch IPS 2.0 inch IPS 3.0 inch IPS Wide Angle 170°+150° 170°+140° 170°+140°+165° 170°+140° Aperture F=1.8 F=2.0 F=2.0 F=1.8 Memory Card Included 64GB Card Included 64GB Card Included 64GB Card Not Included

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Dash Cam For a Decent Price Point, Nice Extras
reviews.reviewText: The Milerong Dash Cam kit comes with both the main front camera/recording unit, and a rear backup-style camera that you can place really where ever you wish. The kit comes with the power cable, two different mounts, the microSD card for memory and the cable connection for the additional camera.Operation of the dash cam itself is very straight forward, there are a series of menus with very blatant options and ability to change them. When the dash cam powers on it immediately starts recording. This is great for just having it plugged in on a accessory only 12v supply or in a cigarette power adapter plug that is only active when the vehicle is on. That way you aren't draining your battery and it goes off an on when you start and turn-off your vehicle. It can record audio also, but I have tried it and it picks up a lot of open window noise or car radio sound. The power cable is long and you can easily mount it where you want and hide the cable around the windshield interior framing.The camera takes great video in 2.5K resolution and it's very smooth. There are no hiccups or blurring or tearing video frames when replaying. It's very clear, and for the price point, is one of the better dash cams I have tested. The night vision is ok, nothing to write home to mom about, but it does the job. I wouldn't expect to be reading plate numbers at night unless you are literally riding the rear bumper of the car in front of you which I don't recommend. However, day time video is great, color is nice, and I was impressed with the clarity and sharpness of the output. The 64GB card is ample memory for it and it has an automatic overwrite mode that just continues with recording over the oldest saved video when space ends.Overall, I recommend the dash cam, for the price point, its a quality device and will get the job done without costing you a ton of money. I have run mine in the freezing winter and heat of summer beating on the windshield and it has not failed me once or froze or overheated, even the suction cup mount has never let go since original install. Great product, give it a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a gift for my husband. He likes it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little camera
reviews.reviewText: I reviewed this once and Amazon didn't approve the review, I am not sure why. This is a great little camera for the price. As far as video quality goes, I think most dashcams are woefully inept at providing a good picture. But this one holds its own with any other dashcam out there, at a much more attractive price point. The kit comes with a front-facing camera as well as a rear-facing camera.The one thing that I wish this camera included was a GPS. In the event of a crash, it would be nice to know which way you were going, and the speed involved, etc... But this camera is more than adequate to establish fault in a collision. And that is really what we are looking for in a dash cam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Missing some parts
reviews.reviewText: Updated: I reached out to the company and they sent me the missing parts quickly. I only needed to confirm my order number. The front camera has been working well. Now its time to install the rear camera using the parts they sent.----I tested this out in my living room first to set up the preferences and make sure it all worked. The controls are not intuitive but I eventually got it. It is menu driven and you have multiple buttons on each side so you have to memorize what each does since you can’t read them once mounted. And one button takes pictures so I ended up with a lot of those.I didn’t notice I was missing the mounting screws and double sided tape for the rear camera until I had laid it all out in the truck. So for now, the rear camera is not set up. I did check the wire length for it though and it was good for an interior install Oddly, the rear camera has a red wire that pigtails out of the connector and is not described in the manual. I have not idea what it’s for. The camera does work without it being connected to anything.I set up the front camera and the wire length was just about perfect. I only had to tie up about 18 inches of cable after the install. The kit comes with a mini pry tool to get the wire behind the trim. I tried it and it worked, but I ended up using my own trim tools since I had a lot of ground to cover. The kit uses a cigarette lighter connection that also has a USB-A outlet in the back. I would have preferred a T-Tap and wish the kit had included this as an option. Since this used the only outlet of this type in the truck, I can’t use the Radar Detector plug if I ever needed to and have this camera run at the same time without buying a power splitter.The kit comes with little baby wire holders but I found they were too small for the wire and didn’t stick to the plastic trim parts. It also comes with two front camera mounts. One is a suction cup which I used. The other is a double sticky tape mount. The suction cup was actually pretty good so I plan to stay with that for now.For the price, this isn’t a bad kit and the install can be easy or hard depending upon how you run the wires. There are a few design and parts issues they really need to look at addressing. I may make my own tap to free up the outlet and I may reach out to the company for parts to install the rear camera For now,, we’ll keep this and see how it goes over time. .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: In my previous car I had a front/back camera setup, and it came in handy when I was rear ended. I got this for my Mazda CX9 and installed it in about an hour. The cables are plenty long and I had no problem routing them. I mounted the rear camera inside at the top of the window as opposed to outside near the license plate. I've been using it for about a week now and the front camera can be set to display just the front view, the back view, or both side by side. When I power up it displays the front view with the back view in the upper right quarter of the screen, which is where I leave it set. It can be set to use Wi-Fi and playback on your phone, but I just remove the memory card and view the videos on my computer. This setup has a much larger display screen than my previous one and good quality video both front and back. I have it in case something happens while I'm driving but it has other features. Only thing I could not figure out was the extra red wire coming out of the rear camera. I did not see anything in the manual that addressed it for my installation. Good setup for the price.
